name: RatsomWare
description:
------------------[-Story-]-------------------

In a normal day on your computer, by chance of fate and by your carelessness, you end up downloading a RansomWere know as RatsomWare, the Lindows Defender could not help, now there is only one option

-----------------[-Credits-]------------------

Game made in Game Maker 8.1

Music by Patrick Arteaga - https://patrickdearteaga.com/es/index-es/

Sounds made in Bfxr - https://www.bfxr.net/

Game made for IndieWare Jam 2020
